question: At TechVision Corp, data engineer Alex is exploring how Sora can be used to enhance video content creation. Which key aspect should Alex focus on to ensure the most accurate video generation using Sora?
options: Ensuring the video is under 2 minutes
Crafting detailed and structured text prompts
Focusing on the length of the text prompt
correct_answer: Crafting detailed and structured text prompts
explanation: Crafting detailed and structured text prompts is crucial for accurate video generation as it provides clear guidance to the system.
